about_the_game:
There was a pair of siblings, Rei and Reo, who lived a happy life despite being just the two of them. However, on a night when an ominous crescent moon rose, Reo was drawn by an unknown force and disappeared from their home. Confused and distressed, Ray receives a letter.

"Dear Rei, come to the castle."

Evercastle is the story of a young girl who sets out on an adventure to the mysterious castle, in search of her lost brother. In this magical action RPG, you must master various spells to overcome monsters and traps, defeat powerful enemies, and reach the castle's depths to rescue your beloved family.

  • Explore a castle filled with magical dangers and defeat your foes.

  • Experience a world inspired by bullet-hell games and cartoon-style illustrations, and interact with new friends and bosses.

  • Dodge bullet patterns rendered in 3D coming from all directions, and strike back against enemies.

  • The more dangerous and powerful your enemies, the stronger you become. Learn a variety of spells and use them strategically to suit each situation.

  • Can Rei find her young brother and return home? It's all up to you.
